STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_1.zhcn_desc: 短程载人舰载机，速度快，体型小，突防生存能力强。
STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_1.en_desc: These manned strike craft are launched from a mothership and rely on their speed and small size to survive long enough to punch through enemy defenses.

STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_2.zhcn_desc: 新一代舰载机装备了改进的航空电子设备，同时拥有更优良的操作性能及更强劲的武器装备。
STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_2.en_desc: The next generation of strike craft, featuring improved avionics, better handling characteristics and more powerful armaments.

STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_3.zhcn_desc: 深度改良型舰载机，性能远胜于先期版本，是每位飞行员梦寐以求的机型。
STRIKE_CRAFT_HANGAR_3.en_desc: A further refinement in strike craft design, these advanced strike craft are a pilot's dream. Their performance far exceeds that of previous models.

EMPTY_DRIVE.zhcn_desc: 没有超光速引擎的飞船不能离开本地恒星系。
EMPTY_DRIVE.en_desc: Ships without FTL drives will never be able to leave the solar systems in which they were built.
EMPTY_DRIVE.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

HYPER_DRIVE_1.zhcn_desc: 装备了超空间引擎的飞飞船能沿着星系间的超平面航道航行，但好处是可以在星系内随时随地达到超光速航速。
HYPER_DRIVE_1.en_desc: Ships equipped with Hyper Drives travel swiftly between the edges of star systems along interstellar hyperlanes.
HYPER_DRIVE_1.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

HYPER_DRIVE_2.zhcn_desc: 装备了超空间引擎的飞飞船能沿着星系间的超平面航道航行，但好处是可以在星系内随时随地达到超光速航速。

HYPER_DRIVE_2.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

HYPER_DRIVE_3.zhcn_desc: 装备了超空间引擎的飞飞船能沿着星系间的超平面航道航行，但好处是可以在星系内随时随地达到超光速航速。
HYPER_DRIVE_3.en_desc: Ships equipped with Hyper Drives travel swiftly between the edges of star systems along interstellar hyperlanes.
HYPER_DRIVE_3.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

JUMP_DRIVE_1.zhcn_desc: 跃迁引擎能够在现实空间中撕开一个飞船大小的空洞，使飞船实现短途的恒星间跃迁。人们还不太能真正理解飞船跃迁时穿过的空间本质。
JUMP_DRIVE_1.en_desc: The Jump Drive tears ship-sized holes in the very fabric of reality, allowing for near-instantaneous movement between systems. The nature of the space the ship passes through on this journey is still poorly understood.
JUMP_DRIVE_1.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

PSI_JUMP_DRIVE_1.zhcn_desc: 灵能跃迁引擎利用船员的潜在灵能打断时空的连续性，消除目的地与出发地之间的距离。理论上是这样。
PSI_JUMP_DRIVE_1.en_desc: The Psi Jump Drive harnesses the psionic potential of the ship's crew to warp the local space-time continuum, eliminating the distance between the point of origin and the destination. Supposedly.
PSI_JUMP_DRIVE_1.zhcn_ship_modifier: 跃迁充能时间：§R-80%§!\n跃迁引擎范围：§G+50%§!
PSI_JUMP_DRIVE_1.zhcn_class_restriction: 军事舰船，工程船，殖民船，科研船，运输舰，巨像

SENSOR_1.zhcn_desc: 雷达系统是在行星上创造、利用于深空的技术。雷达系统能够为在恒星间航行的飞船提供最基本的侦测和追踪数据。
SENSOR_1.en_desc: A planet-bound technology adapted for use in deep space, the radar system provides basic detection and tracking capability for interstellar vessels.

SENSOR_2.zhcn_desc: 这些传感器已经过调整，可以检测太空中的任何引力变化，例如由舰船出现导致的力场扭曲波动。
SENSOR_2.en_desc: These sensors have been tuned to look for any gravitational changes in space, such as those produced by the presence of a starship.

SENSOR_3.zhcn_desc: 这些传感器在监测由于星际飞船飞行造成的亚空间波动。它们的敏感度和监测范围甚至要高于引力监测传感器阵列。
SENSOR_3.en_desc: Sensors that detect the subspace fluctuations left in the wake of traveling starships. Their sensitivity and range is greater than that of a gravitic sensor array.

SENSOR_4.zhcn_desc: 先进的传感器依靠旋转的快子束，即使在极远距离也能检测船舶运动。
SENSOR_4.en_desc: Advanced sensors that rely on rotating tachyon beams to detect ship movements even at extreme distances.

LARGE_SPACE_AMOEBA_WEAPON.zhcn_desc: 太空变形虫的武器化是进化史上的一个奇迹。
LARGE_SPACE_AMOEBA_WEAPON.en_desc: The weaponized emissions of the Space Amoebas are truly a marvel of evolution.

AMOEBA_STRIKE_CRAFT.zhcn_desc: 变形虫会生出鞭毛，经印随指导后可回应测出舰体磁场的微小变化，可用作高效的攻击机。
AMOEBA_STRIKE_CRAFT.en_desc: Amoebas bred in captivity spawn Flagella that can be imprinted to respond to subtle shifts in hull magnetization, allowing us to use them as effective strike craft.

SPACE_CLOUD_LIGHTNING.zhcn_desc: 利用我们基本相互作用力的理解，我们可以在虚空云中生成相当可观的内部电荷至满负荷，天云闪电武器系统是极有潜力的伤害制造者。
SPACE_CLOUD_LIGHTNING.en_desc: Utilizing our understanding of the fundamental forces involved in generating the Void Clouds' considerable internal charge to the fullest, the Cloud Lightning weapon system is a potent damage-dealer.

SMALL_CRYSTAL_SHIP_BLUE_LIGHTNING.zhcn_desc: 蓝色破片投射器模仿蓝宝石晶体的武器化投射来造成损害。

MEDIUM_PROBE_LIGHTNING.zhcn_desc: 一种不寻常的武器，该能量发射器在功能上非常类似其他能量武器，但使用的是此前从未武器化的频率和频谱。
MEDIUM_PROBE_LIGHTNING.en_desc: An unusual form of weaponry, this energy emitter closely resembles other energy weapons in function, but operates with a frequency and within a spectrum never before weaponized.

SPACE_WHALE_WEAPON.zhcn_desc: 能源虹吸器模仿缇扬奇的某种奇特生物现象制成，可以扰乱敌方飞船的能源传输媒介。
SPACE_WHALE_WEAPON.en_desc: Modeled after a peculiar biological process observed in the Tiyanki, the Energy Siphon excites the energy transfer medium of targeted enemy vessels.

LARGE_SCOURGE_MISSILE_1.zhcn_desc: 天灾导弹的载荷是虫群用于星际战争的多种生化物质的混合物，已被证明对最难对付的军舰也意外的有效。
LARGE_SCOURGE_MISSILE_1.en_desc: The Scourge Missile payloads are made up of many of the biochemical compounds used by the Swarm in interstellar combat, having proven unexpectedly effective against even the hardiest of military vessels.

MEDIUM_SCOURGE_PROJECTILE_WEAPON.zhcn_desc: 封装在弹道载体之中的高腐蚀性的有机物曾被用于虫群的轨道轰炸，现在已被改装成舰船武器。
MEDIUM_SCOURGE_PROJECTILE_WEAPON.en_desc: Enclosed in ballistic capsules, the highly corrosive organic matter used in the Swarm's orbital bombardment can be repurposed as ship munitions.

SMALL_SCOURGE_PROJECTILE_WEAPON.zhcn_desc: 封装在弹道载体之中的高腐蚀性的有机物曾被用于虫群的轨道轰炸，现在已被改装成舰船武器。
SMALL_SCOURGE_PROJECTILE_WEAPON.en_desc: Enclosed in ballistic capsules, the highly corrosive organic matter used in the Swarm's orbital bombardment can be repurposed as ship munitions.

SWARM_STRIKE_CRAFT.zhcn_desc: 这些微缩版的索林原虫克隆体可以受舰队通信系统控制，成为我们高效的舰载机。
SWARM_STRIKE_CRAFT.en_desc: Cloned, miniaturized Prethoryn specimen can be controlled through wavelengths close to those we use for intra-fleet communication, allowing us to use them as effective strike craft.

MISSILE_1.en_desc: Space-to-space missiles equipped with high-yield nuclear warheads. Although based on old pre-space technology, these crude fire-and-forget weapons can be surprisingly effective at range.

MISSILE_2.zhcn_desc: 升级版的深空导弹，配备了更强大的核聚变弹头，飞行能力进一步提升。
MISSILE_2.en_desc: These updated space-to-space missiles have more powerful fusion warheads and improved flight performance.

MISSILE_3.zhcn_desc: 这些先进的导弹配备有强劲的反物质弹头。更加完善的导航系统大大提高了索敌能力。
MISSILE_3.en_desc: Advanced missiles equipped with very powerful antimatter warheads. A new and improved guidance system gives them a better chance of finding their targets.

MISSILE_4.zhcn_desc: 最新的深空导弹，升级之后装备了威力极度强大的弹头，它能够从真空中汲取真空零点能。
MISSILE_4.en_desc: The latest version of space-to-space missile, this upgraded variant has an immensely powerful warhead that draws its energy from a zero point vacuum.

PLANET_KILLER_CRACKER.zhcn_desc: 发射的热能流能够加热行星大气，并引爆行星核心，此举将彻底的毁灭星球的地壳构造。 最后，一个相对较小的冲击波会将行星炸得四分五裂。
PLANET_KILLER_CRACKER.en_desc: A directed feed of thermic energy superheats the atmosphere and agitates the planet's core, setting up disastrous tectonic events. A final and comparatively minute concussive blast is then delivered, cracking the planet open.

PLANET_KILLER_SHIELDER.zhcn_desc: 一个永久的、不可逾越的屏蔽场将被部署在行星表面（吸收一些波长的光）。
PLANET_KILLER_SHIELDER.en_desc: A shielding field is deployed around a planet, creating a barrier that is permanent and impenetrable (save for some wavelengths of light).

PLANET_KILLER_NEUTRON.zhcn_desc: 一种加速的中子辐射羽流将会扫过行星表面，并对大多数生物组织进行破坏。
PLANET_KILLER_NEUTRON.en_desc: An accelerated plume of neutron radiation "paints" the planet surface, severely degrading most materials and directly destroying biological tissue.

PLANET_KILLER_GODRAY.zhcn_desc: 一个灵能投射器将圣洁真理投放到行星上，使所有有信仰的人成为正信者并消灭那些没有信仰的人。
PLANET_KILLER_GODRAY.en_desc: A psionic projector shines divine truth upon the world to make true believers out of all who are capable of belief, and annihilating those who are not.

PLANET_KILLER_NANOBOTS.zhcn_desc: 向大气中散布大量纳米机器人，它们侵入智慧生命并将自己转化为控制性的植入物，最终将不知情的宿主转化为被机械智能控制的义体人。
PLANET_KILLER_NANOBOTS.en_desc: Swarms of nanobots are dispersed in the atmosphere. They infect sapient beings and restructure themselves into cybernetic implants, turning their unwitting hosts into cyborgs slaved to the Machine Intelligence.

POINT_DEFENCE_1.zhcn_desc: 对于那些又大又笨重的军用舰船来说，在船体上安装反导弹和反攻击机的装置是很有必要的。
POINT_DEFENCE_1.en_desc: Hull-mounted countermeasures against missiles and strike craft are often essential for larger and slower military vessels.

POINT_DEFENCE_2.zhcn_desc: 升级后的弹道预测算法可以提升追踪能力和点防御的效果。
POINT_DEFENCE_2.en_desc: Updated prediction algorithms improves tracking and point-defense efficency.

POINT_DEFENCE_3.zhcn_desc: 种类丰富的弹药能够显著提升拦截威胁的能力。
POINT_DEFENCE_3.en_desc: A wider range of available ammunition types vastly improves the effective interception rate of incoming threats.

FLAK_BATTERY_1.zhcn_desc: 高射炮可以近距离发射榴弹，这对敌人的舰载机杀伤巨大，当然也能够防御导弹。
FLAK_BATTERY_1.en_desc: Gun batteries that fire shrapnel rounds at close range. They are particularly lethal to enemy strike craft, but can also defend against missiles.

FLAK_BATTERY_2.zhcn_desc: 升级后的高射炮装备了新型更加强大的榴弹。
FLAK_BATTERY_2.en_desc: Upgraded flak batteries with new, more powerful shrapnel rounds.

FLAK_BATTERY_3.zhcn_desc: 使用预测跟踪算法和更强大的齐射，使得这些高射炮拥有了难以置信的打击敌军舰载机的能力。
FLAK_BATTERY_3.en_desc: Predictive tracking algorithms and even more powerful rounds make these batteries incredibly lethal to enemy strike craft.

AUTOCANNON_1.en_desc: Large-caliber ballistic weapons that fire cased explosive shells. The main advantage of these cannons is their high rate of fire.

AUTOCANNON_2.zhcn_desc: 这些升级后的旋转机关炮具备更完善的追踪和火力控制系统，进一步增加了开火速率。
AUTOCANNON_2.en_desc: These upgraded rotary autocannons feature improved tracking and fire control systems. This allows them to maintain an even higher rate of fire.
